gameDetails.name: Mint Works: Promo 1
gameDetails.description:
Mint Works: Promo 1 features two new advanced locations (Team Builder and Remover), a solo AI opponent (Hank the Leech), and a new co-op mode against Mint Corp AI that includes a special AI-only location and rules for co-op play. It also includes six red mints worth 5 mints each.

Mint Works: Promo 1 debuted at Gen Con 2017, and later editions of this item included five cards instead of only four.
